scripts.start:force: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('netstat -ano | findstr :3000',{stdio:'ignore'}); try{const out=require('child_process').execSync('netstat -ano | findstr :3000',{encoding:'utf8'}); const pids=[...new Set(out.split(/\r?\n/).filter(l=>l.trim()).map(l=>l.trim().split(/\s+/).pop()).filter(pid=>pid&&/^[0-9]+$/.test(pid)))]; for(const pid of pids){try{require('child_process').execSync('taskkill /PID '+pid+' /F',{stdio:'ignore'});}catch{}}}catch{}; require('child_process').spawn(process.platform==='win32'?'npm.cmd':'npm',['run','start'],{stdio:'inherit',shell:true});"
